resources.string: Look at your tablet to unlock it.

"Keep these things in mind:
"
"Face matching is less secure than a pattern, PIN, or password.
"
Someone who looks like you could unlock your tablet."
"
The data used to recognize your face is kept private on the tablet."
"

" "
"Find an indoor spotâ€”not too bright or too dim.
"
Hold the tablet at eye level."
"
Your tablet unlocks as soon as it recognizes you.
"If your tablet doesn't recognize your face, you can unlock with your pattern, PIN, or password."

"Examples:
"
"In different lighting
"
With or without prescription glasses"
"
Bearded or clean-shaven"
"" Hold the tablet at eye level. "
